heading: HB08893
0: AN ACT AMENDING REPUBLIC ACT NO. 10868, OTHERWISE KNOWN AS "AN ACT HONORING AND GRANTING ADDITIONAL BENEFITS AND PRIVILEGES TO FILIPINO CENTENARIANS, AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES
status: Pending with the Committee on SENIOR CITIZENS since 2019-02-04
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HB08893
FULL TITLE : AN ACT AMENDING REPUBLIC ACT NO. 10868, OTHERWISE KNOWN AS "AN ACT HONORING AND GRANTING ADDITIONAL BENEFITS AND PRIVILEGES TO FILIPINO CENTENARIANS, AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES
ABSTRACT : Seeks to further help the elderly Filipinos by allowing them to avail of the cash grant at the age of Ninety (90) and claim the 80% of the Php 100,000.00 cash grant, with the remaining 20% to be granted upon reaching the age of 100.
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : NIETO, JOHN MARVIN "YUL SERVO" C.
DATE FILED : 2019-01-29
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON SENIOR CITIZENS ON 2019-02-04
